faqSection.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions.

items.question: Is lunch provided for free?
items.answer: Yes, we offer free lunch for all participants.

items.question: Do you have 2-bedroom suites?
items.answer: We offer 1 or 2-bedroom suites based on availability.

items.question: Is Wi-Fi included in the price?
items.answer: Yes, Wi-Fi is included at no extra cost.

items.question: Where can I get support?
items.answer: You can contact us via our Contact form or our support email.
